name: Cannon Beach
description: Cannon Beach has been recognized as Overall's Best Beach, one of America's Best Arts Cities, and one of the most beautiful places in the world.

name: Rio de Janeiro
description: Rio de Janeiro, where historic sites, sparkling beaches, green belts and the cheerful attitude of the locals take tourists to the world where heaven meets earth.

name: Cancun
description: With its gorgeous turquoise seas, powdery white-sand beaches, and vibrant coral reefs, it’s no surprise that Cancun is one of Mexico’s most popular resort areas.

name: Cape Town
description: The capital city of South Africa, Cape Town is located mountains and sea and is one of the famous places to visit in South Africa.

name: Miami
description: Beyond the radiant sun, surf and sand, discover Miami Beach's rich history as an entertainment and cultural destination.

name: Mar del Plata
description: Magnificent beaches, wide bays, imposing cliffs and forests await you in the city of Mar del Plata.
